A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely stunning! Rian Johnson gave us an incredible gift with this installment of the Star Wars saga. Unexpected story\, non stop excitement\, many shocking (but right) moments...As a life long fan of star wars\, this blew me out of the water. I have no idea what to expect for Episode IX\, and I kind of like it that way. Bravo\, Mr. Johnson\, cast\, and crew. You guys knocked it out of the park!!
